t: Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye the LORD{H3050}. Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye the LORD{H3068} from the heavens{H8064}: praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him in the heights{H4791}.
Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye him, all his angels{H4397}: praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye him, all his hosts{H6635}.
Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye him, sun{H8121} and moon{H3394}: praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him, all ye stars{H3556} of light{H216}.
Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him, ye heavens{H8064} of heavens{H8064}, and ye waters{H4325} that be above the heavens{H8064}.
Let them praise{H1984}{(H8762)} the name{H8034} of the LORD{H3068}: for he commanded{H6680}{(H8765)}, and they were created{H1254}{(H8738)}.
He hath also stablished{H5975}{(H8686)} them for ever{H5703} and ever{H5769}: he hath made{H5414}{(H8804)} a decree{H2706} which shall not pass{H5674}{(H8799)}.
Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} the LORD{H3068} from the earth{H776}, ye dragons{H8577}, and all deeps{H8415}:
Fire{H784}, and hail{H1259}; snow{H7950}, and vapour{H7008}; stormy{H5591} wind{H7307} fulfilling{H6213}{(H8802)} his word{H1697}:
Mountains{H2022}, and all hills{H1389}; fruitful{H6529} trees{H6086}, and all cedars{H730}:
Beasts{H2416}, and all cattle{H929}; creeping things{H7431}, and flying{H3671} fowl{H6833}:
Kings{H4428} of the earth{H776}, and all people{H3816}; princes{H8269}, and all judges{H8199}{(H8802)} of the earth{H776}:
Both young men{H970}, and maidens{H1330}; old men{H2205}, and children{H5288}:
Let them praise{H1984}{(H8762)} the name{H8034} of the LORD{H3068}: for his name{H8034} alone is excellent{H7682}{(H8737)}; his glory{H1935} is above the earth{H776} and heaven{H8064}.

He also exalteth{H7311}{(H8686)} the horn{H7161} of his people{H5971}, the praise{H8416} of all his saints{H2623}; even of the children{H1121} of Israel{H3478}, a people{H5971} near{H7138} unto him. Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye the LORD{H3050}.
